Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 6th overall pick, by Brooklyn in 2019...
Traded from Brooklyn to Detroit on 3/2/2019 (Going to BRO: 1B Ron Hall. Going to DET: C Manuel Rodarte)...
Injured on 5/23/2019 with a Strained Abdominal Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 7/11/2019, off Jerry Engstrom (SF)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/6/2019, off Matthew Gordillo (CIN)...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/17/2020, hitting .409 with 3 HR, 5 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/17/2021, hitting .333 with 3 HR, 10 RBI...
